Olympiad Commands: //oly_save - Start Save Task Usage - //oly_save //add_oly_points - Add Olympiad Points Usage - //add_oly_points char_name point_to_add //add_hero - Add Hero Status to Character Usage - //add_hero Target Read GM Ban Read GM Skills Read GM Clan Read GM Residence(Castle Edit) Read GM Seven Sing Read GM Olympiad Read GM Cursed Weapons Read GM Zone
